segments.text: Are you going anywhere for your vacation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we're making plans for a tour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That'll be lovely . Where are you going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well start out from Long Island this Friday . We've planned a four day drive to Salt Lake City , where we'll join my brother and his family on his fortieth birthday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you've got to prepare a lot of food and enough sleeping bags then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , we'll spend the nights in hotels and enjoy local food as we pass by . How does it sound , David ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds good . You can do a lot of sightseeing , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we'll take our time . And we'll go to Five-lake Strict and the Wall Street .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , you're going to have a really nice vacation .
segments.speaker: S1
